title: Even Banksy is working from home during the coronavirus crisis
description: The elusive street artist follows official advice to stay at home during the coronavirus crisis by creating a new artwork in his bathroom that shows his trademark stencilled rats running amok around the sink and toilet.
content:
Posted 
April 17, 2020 08:07:14
It would seem many of us are navigating the ups and downs of working from home at the moment and street artist Banksy is no exception.
The elusive artist has followed official advice to stay at home during the coronavirus cr… [+1499 chars]
